title: The Stolen Years - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Movie   Amnesia   Divorce   Domestic Affairs   Female Protagonist   Marriage
author: Ba Yue Chang An   八月长安
description:
The last thing He Man remembered is she was on her honeymoon with Xie Yu, her husband. However, the girl suddenly wakes up on a hospital bed and already divorced. He Man has amnesia and forgets about her last five years.

She doesn't understand why Xie Yu and her divorced when they loves each other. She does not understand why her best friend now becomes her enemy. She doesn't understand why everyone seems to loathe her so much.

As He Man tries to collect her memories back, she begins to discover things she never expects.>
